meanings.definition: The activity or practice of recording and sharing video blogs online.
meanings.sent1: Vlogging has become a popular way for people to share their daily lives online.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching vlogging videos of travel adventures on the internet.
meanings.sent3: When I tried vlogging, I accidentally recorded my cat instead of myself!
meanings.sent4: Her vlogging journey was like a digital diary that the whole world could read.
meanings.sent5: The vlogging trend allows everyone to be a storyteller through videos.

meanings.sent1: She updates her vlogging with new content every week.
meanings.sent2: I started my own vlogging to document my cooking experiments.
meanings.sent3: His vlogging about funny cat videos always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The vlogging was a window into her daily life for all her followers.
meanings.sent5: Watching her vlogging felt like peeking into someone else's world.
